thread.title: Jennings Stambaugh

author: Jennings Stambaugh
title: Jennings Stambaugh
text: This is my first time screen printing. The set up of my 4 arm press was super easy and took me about 30 min, mostly because I was gawking at all my new tools and toys. Feels solidly built. When going to mix my emulsion it felt stiff and different from the training video so I called Ryonet. They told me that it probably froze in shipping and before I could say anything else they rushed me a fresh one. Amazing! They are super fast and friendly. Ill definately buy from them again when I need additional stuff.
